content: ever cast on for some socks and decide the yarn is just too darned pretty to hide in your shoes this simple pattern is how i changed my mind and made some awesome striped fingerless mittens **please note ** many people have mentioned that these run large especially at the wrist area i am a tight knitter if you want to decrease the cast on to 56 as i did when using kroy sock yarn a bit thicker yarn or knit in a rib that will make it more fitted some knitters have done some wrist decreases
